c74object.name: abc.hoa.decoder~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.decoder~ is an 2D High Order Ambisonics (HOA) decoder.
This object enable you to decode from ambisonic spatial components to sets of loudspeakers. At order 1, the decoder is by default for 4 loudspeakers, at order 2, 6 LS, at order 3, 8 LS, ... at order 7,16 LS. You can change the number of loudspeakers with the speakers attribut. This decoder use Ambisonics Channel Numbering and N2D format.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1:min=1:max=7:step=1].

attribute.name: speakers
attribute.description: sets the number of speakers used to synthesized the acoustic field [init=2N+2:min=3:max=16:step=1].

attribute.name: stereo
attribute.description: stereo mode make a stereo reduction of the decoded soundfield [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=1].

method.name: a[index]
method.description: sets the angle of the speaker [index], [index] is a 2 digits integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "06" for example.
method.digest: sets the angle of the speaker [index]

method.name: angularoffset
method.description: sets an offset to the angle of all the speakers [min=-180:max=180:step=1].
method.digest: sets an offset to the angle of all the speakers

method.name: directangles
method.description: sets rotation direction, true is anti-clockwise, false is clockwise [init=1:min=0:max=1:step=1].

method.name: stereo
method.description: sets decoder mode to be stereo or ambisonic, true is stereo decode, false is ambisonic decode [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=1].
method.digest: sets decoder mode to be stereo or ambisonic
